subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Luis-León Sánchez won the Paris-Nice race on Sunday, a day after taking over the overall lead. Antonio Colom won the final stage, outracing Alberto Contador, a fellow Spaniard, down the famed Promenade des Anglais, completing the 73.9-mile trek around Nice in 2 hours 47 minutes 49 seconds. In the overall standings, Frank Schleck of Luxembourg was a minute behind in second. Paris.
